alert.note: Alert for Jones; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 12:01AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jones and southwestern Stanley Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 101 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midland, or 27 miles northwest of Murdo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Capa around 115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Van Metre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
